{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>6. Bey Herrn Haag an der Augustinergaß sind zu verkauffen: <BIBL><TITLE>Prideaun A. und N. Testam</TITLE>, in einer Connex. mit der Völcker-Historie, <PLACE>Berlin</PLACE> <YEAR>1725</YEAR>. <VOLUME>4. II. Tom. 1. Vol. 2</VOLUME> † <AUTHOR>Cattenburg</AUTHOR></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Sapientia Mos. de Vita & Scriptis Mosis contra Deistas</TITLE>. <PLACE>Amst.</PLACE> <YEAR>1737</YEAR>. <FORMAT>4.</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Bibl.</TITLE> <VOLUME>8r. 70.</VOLUME> <AUTHOR>Interpp. Reineccii</AUTHOR>, <PLACE>Lips.</PLACE> <YEAR>1737</YEAR>. <FORMAT>8°.</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Bibl. Hebr.</TITLE> von <AUTHOR>punctata Leusdenii</AUTHOR>, <PLACE>Frf.</PLACE> <YEAR>1694</YEAR>. <FORMAT>12.</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Seldenus</AUTHOR> <TITLE>de Diis Syris</TITLE>. <PLACE>Lips.</PLACE> <YEAR>1692</YEAR>. <FORMAT>8.</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Gottschedens</AUTHOR> <TITLE>critische Dichtkunst</TITLE>, <PLACE>Leipzig</PLACE> <YEAR>1737</YEAR>. <FORMAT>8v°.</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Bödickers</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Grundsätze der Deutschen Sprach</TITLE>, <PLACE>Berlin</PLACE>, <YEAR>1729</YEAR>. <FORMAT>8v°.</FORMAT></BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":11,"explanation":"Fixed the following issues:
1. Replaced Unicode character √ü with ß in "Augustinergaß"
2. Replaced Unicode character √∂ with ö in "Völcker-Historie"
3. Changed "1I" to "II" in volume notation (likely OCR error)
4. Changed PRIZE tag to AUTHOR tag for "Cattenburg" (contextually more appropriate)
5. Added missing closing </BIBL> tag after the first bibliographic entry
6. Escaped ampersand in "Vita & Scriptis" to "&"
7. Replaced Unicode character √≤ with ° in format "8°"
8. Replaced Unicode character √≤ with ° in format "8v°" (two occurrences)
9. Replaced Unicode character √∂ with ö in "Bödickers"
10. Replaced Unicode character √§ with ä in "Grundsätze"
11. Fixed overall structure by ensuring all BIBL tags are properly closed"}

parsed.fixed_xml: <ITEM>6. Bey Herrn Haag an der Augustinergaß sind zu verkauffen: <BIBL><TITLE>Prideaun A. und N. Testam</TITLE>, in einer Connex. mit der Völcker-Historie, <PLACE>Berlin</PLACE> <YEAR>1725</YEAR>. <VOLUME>4. II. Tom. 1. Vol. 2</VOLUME> † <AUTHOR>Cattenburg</AUTHOR></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Sapientia Mos. de Vita & Scriptis Mosis contra Deistas</TITLE>. <PLACE>Amst.</PLACE> <YEAR>1737</YEAR>. <FORMAT>4.</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Bibl.</TITLE> <VOLUME>8r. 70.</VOLUME> <AUTHOR>Interpp. Reineccii</AUTHOR>, <PLACE>Lips.</PLACE> <YEAR>1737</YEAR>. <FORMAT>8°.</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Bibl. Hebr.</TITLE> von <AUTHOR>punctata Leusdenii</AUTHOR>, <PLACE>Frf.</PLACE> <YEAR>1694</YEAR>. <FORMAT>12.</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Seldenus</AUTHOR> <TITLE>de Diis Syris</TITLE>. <PLACE>Lips.</PLACE> <YEAR>1692</YEAR>. <FORMAT>8.</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Gottschedens</AUTHOR> <TITLE>critische Dichtkunst</TITLE>, <PLACE>Leipzig</PLACE> <YEAR>1737</YEAR>. <FORMAT>8v°.</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Bödickers</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Grundsätze der Deutschen Sprach</TITLE>, <PLACE>Berlin</PLACE>, <YEAR>1729</YEAR>. <FORMAT>8v°.</FORMAT></BIBL></ITEM>
parsed.explanation:
Fixed the following issues:
1. Replaced Unicode character √ü with ß in "Augustinergaß"
2. Replaced Unicode character √∂ with ö in "Völcker-Historie"
3. Changed "1I" to "II" in volume notation (likely OCR error)
4. Changed PRIZE tag to AUTHOR tag for "Cattenburg" (contextually more appropriate)
5. Added missing closing </BIBL> tag after the first bibliographic entry
6. Escaped ampersand in "Vita & Scriptis" to "&"
7. Replaced Unicode character √≤ with ° in format "8°"
8. Replaced Unicode character √≤ with ° in format "8v°" (two occurrences)
9. Replaced Unicode character √∂ with ö in "Bödickers"
10. Replaced Unicode character √§ with ä in "Grundsätze"
11. Fixed overall structure by ensuring all BIBL tags are properly closed
